---

This is the companion website for the manuscript:

>Junker, L., Schoedel, R., & Pargent, F. (2024). Towards a Clearer Understanding of Causal Estimands: The Importance of Joint Effects in Longitudinal Designs with Time-Varying Treatments. <https://doi.org/10.31234/osf.io/zmh5a>

You can find the preprint on PsyArXiv [here](https://doi.org/10.31234/osf.io/zmh5a).
You can find all code and materials [here](https://osf.io/eczky/).

---

The website contains the supplementary materials:

- [Supplement 1](supplement_1.qmd): **Estimate expected potential outcomes in a hypothetical RCT**
- [Supplement 2](supplement_2.qmd): **Estimate different causal effects in a hypothetical RCT**

*Note:* [Supplement 1](supplement_1.qmd) computes *Table 1* from the manuscript, while [Supplement 2](supplement_2.qmd) extends our simulated example to various total, joint, and direct effects.
